subject: refactor(types): rename Arc sourceId/targetId to source/target
body:
Breaking change (alpha): renamed Arc.sourceId → Arc.source and
Arc.targetId → Arc.target across the entire codebase (26 files).

The old names implied IDs but the import format uses item titles.
The new names are clearer — `source` and `target` describe what they
hold without implying a specific type. The import parser still accepts
`sourceId`/`targetId` as aliases for backward compatibility.

Also added "Alpha Phase — Breaking Changes Expected" section to
CLAUDE.md so future decisions aren't blocked by backwards compatibility
concerns. Updated conventions.ts to remove required id/timestamp
fields from the JSON format description, matching the simplified
AI output guide.

Dexie schema bumped to v2 for index rename (source, target).
